Posts.Content: mhtan wrote: I am going through chemo on my own and just need some advice/comments.   I was diagnosed with StageIIB cancer.  My sentinnel node came by clear; however, my tumor size was initially 2.5cm but after the mastectomy showed that the total residual tumor measured 5.8 cm.   I'm going through ajuvant chemo now and am going on my third cycle.   I don't want to do the radiation if it's not necessary.  If I had a mastectomy and no nodes involved and going through chemo do I really need the radiation.   Any thoughts/advice?  I'm with the military but since I'm overseas in Korea I'm going to a Korean hospital and hard to understand my oncologist.
